column4: since not all get the Vista Installation disk with their PC, is there any way to fix non-booting Vista without the disk?
all you would really need it for is to rebuild the MBR, right?
I don't know. It's the usual winlogon.exe corrupted or not found error, and many solutions suggested in forums always tell you to use Vista Installation disc
yikes, unsure of that, I defer to the experts here...
